document.full_text: in an effort to save control of an important state while japan's nuclear crisis and the libyan rebellion were making headlines, the government effectively turned its back on angela merkel's supposed virtues.
document.title: politicus: in germany, an election hangover
lines_and_colors: in an effort to save control of an important state while japan's nuclear crisis and the libyan rebellion were making headlines, the government effectively turned its back on angela merkel's supposed virtues.
